application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Maidenhair tree, Gingko biloba, (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.T4 - Pittosporum spp., (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.T5 - Cotinus spp., (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.T6 - Magnolia grandiflora, (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.T7 - Eleagnus spp., (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.T8 - Lawson Cypress, Chaemecyparis lawsonia, (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.T9 - Willow, Salix spp., (Located in the rear garden of the property): Fell to as near to ground level as is possible.G1 - Leyland Cypresses, X Cupressocyparis leylandii, (Located in the rear garden of the property):  Reduce height by approximately 2.5m, to match the height of Leyland Cypress trees located in the neighbouring garden; remove lower branches back to the branch / stem junction, from ground level up to the height of the proposed new garden outbuilding; reduce remaining lateral branches as far as is possible whilst retaining vegetative growth, to ensure regrowth is achievable from finished cuts.
